variable.description: PO US167194 on M4a instance - Note: Only incomplete POs

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/purchaseOrderServiceV2/types/" xmlns:pur="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/purchaseOrderServiceV2/" xmlns:pjc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/commonPo/flex/PJCPoDraftDistribution/" xmlns:draf="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchaseOrderDistribution/" xmlns:draf1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchasingDocumentSchedule/" xmlns:draf2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchasingDocumentLine/" xmlns:draf3="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchasingDocumentHeader/">
  <soapenv:Body>
    <typ:createPurchaseOrder>
      <typ:createOrderEntry>
        <pur:DocumentStyleId>1</pur:DocumentStyleId>
        <pur:ApprovalActionCode>SUBMIT</pur:ApprovalActionCode>
        <pur:ProcurementBUId>300000046987012</pur:ProcurementBUId>
        <pur:RequisitioningBUId>300000046987012</pur:RequisitioningBUId>
        <pur:SoldToLegalEntityId>300000046973970</pur:SoldToLegalEntityId>
        <pur:BuyerId>300000047341483</pur:BuyerId>
        <pur:SupplierId>300000047414679</pur:SupplierId>
        <pur:SupplierSiteId>300000047414699</pur:SupplierSiteId>
        <pur:SupplierNumber>1255</pur:SupplierNumber>
        <pur:BillToBUId>300000046987012</pur:BillToBUId>
        <pur:BillToLocationId>300000047013200</pur:BillToLocationId>
        <pur:CurrencyCode>USD</pur:CurrencyCode>
        <pur:DocumentDescription>document description #1</pur:DocumentDescription>
        <pur:PaymentTermsId>10134</pur:PaymentTermsId>
        <pur:NoteToReceiver>note to receiver #3</pur:NoteToReceiver>
        <pur:NoteToSupplier>note to suppier #4</pur:NoteToSupplier>
        <!-- this dff may not be set up -->
        <!-- <pur:HeaderFlexfield>
          <draf3:purchaseOrderType>GC</draf3:purchaseOrderType>
          <draf3:contactName>Bevan Bhure</draf3:contactName>
          <draf3:contactPhone>0800-838383</draf3:contactPhone>
          <draf3:contactEmail>bevanwheelbarrow@pizzahut.com</draf3:contactEmail>
          <draf3:contactFax>fax 1234567</draf3:contactFax>
        </pur:HeaderFlexfield> -->
        
        <pur:PurchaseOrderEntryLine>
          <pur:Action>ADD</pur:Action>
          <pur:LineNumber>1</pur:LineNumber>
          <pur:LineTypeId>1</pur:LineTypeId>
          <pur:ItemDescription>Item Description #1</pur:ItemDescription>
          <pur:CategoryId>300000047292806</pur:CategoryId>
          <pur:SupplierItem>Supplier Item 1</pur:SupplierItem>
          <pur:UnitOfMeasureCode>zzu</pur:UnitOfMeasureCode>
          <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">800</pur:Quantity>
          <pur:Price currencyCode="USD">15</pur:Price>
          <pur:PurchaseOrderEntrySchedule>
            <pur:ScheduleNumber>1</pur:ScheduleNumber>
            <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">800</pur:Quantity>
            <pur:ShipToLocationId>300000047013200</pur:ShipToLocationId>
            <pur:ShipToOrganizationId>300000047274444</pur:ShipToOrganizationId>
            <pur:NeedByDate>2019-08-13T00:00:00</pur:NeedByDate>
            <pur:AccrueAtReceiptFlag>false</pur:AccrueAtReceiptFlag>
            <pur:ReceiptDateExceptionActionCode>NONE</pur:ReceiptDateExceptionActionCode>
            <pur:ShipToExceptionActionCode>NONE</pur:ShipToExceptionActionCode>
            <pur:ReceiptCloseTolerancePercent>5</pur:ReceiptCloseTolerancePercent>
            <pur:OverReceiptTolerancePercent>5</pur:OverReceiptTolerancePercent>
            <pur:OverReceiptActionCode>NONE</pur:OverReceiptActionCode>
            <pur:InvoiceMatchOptionCode>P</pur:InvoiceMatchOptionCode>
            <pur:InvoiceCloseTolerancePercent>5</pur:InvoiceCloseTolerancePercent>
            <pur:MatchApprovalLevelCode>3-Way</pur:MatchApprovalLevelCode>
            <pur:PurchaseOrderEntryDistribution>
              <pur:DistributionNumber>1</pur:DistributionNumber>
              <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">800</pur:Quantity>
              <!--<pur:RequesterId>100000021607847</pur:RequesterId>-->
              <pur:POChargeAccount>101.10.64210.000.000.000</pur:POChargeAccount>
            </pur:PurchaseOrderEntryDistribution>
          </pur:PurchaseOrderEntrySchedule>
        </pur:PurchaseOrderEntryLine>
        <pur:PurchaseOrderEntryLine>
          <pur:Action>ADD</pur:Action>
          <pur:LineNumber>2</pur:LineNumber>
          <pur:LineTypeId>1</pur:LineTypeId>
          <pur:ItemDescription>Item Description #1</pur:ItemDescription>
          <pur:CategoryId>300000047292806</pur:CategoryId>
          <pur:SupplierItem>Supplier Item 1</pur:SupplierItem>
          <pur:UnitOfMeasureCode>zzu</pur:UnitOfMeasureCode>
          <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">800</pur:Quantity>
          <pur:Price currencyCode="USD">15</pur:Price>
          <pur:PurchaseOrderEntrySchedule>
            <pur:ScheduleNumber>1</pur:ScheduleNumber>
            <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">800</pur:Quantity>
            <pur:ShipToLocationId>300000047013200</pur:ShipToLocationId>
            <pur:ShipToOrganizationId>300000047274444</pur:ShipToOrganizationId>
            <pur:NeedByDate>2019-08-13T00:00:00</pur:NeedByDate>
            <pur:AccrueAtReceiptFlag>false</pur:AccrueAtReceiptFlag>
            <pur:ReceiptDateExceptionActionCode>NONE</pur:ReceiptDateExceptionActionCode>
            <pur:ShipToExceptionActionCode>NONE</pur:ShipToExceptionActionCode>
            <pur:ReceiptCloseTolerancePercent>5</pur:ReceiptCloseTolerancePercent>
            <pur:OverReceiptTolerancePercent>5</pur:OverReceiptTolerancePercent>
            <pur:OverReceiptActionCode>NONE</pur:OverReceiptActionCode>
            <pur:InvoiceMatchOptionCode>P</pur:InvoiceMatchOptionCode>
            <pur:InvoiceCloseTolerancePercent>5</pur:InvoiceCloseTolerancePercent>
            <pur:MatchApprovalLevelCode>3-Way</pur:MatchApprovalLevelCode>
            <pur:PurchaseOrderEntryDistribution>
              <pur:DistributionNumber>1</pur:DistributionNumber>
              <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">800</pur:Quantity>
              <!--<pur:RequesterId>100000021607847</pur:RequesterId>-->
              <pur:POChargeAccount>101.10.64210.000.000.000</pur:POChargeAccount>
            </pur:PurchaseOrderEntryDistribution>
          </pur:PurchaseOrderEntrySchedule>
        </pur:PurchaseOrderEntryLine>
       
      </typ:createOrderEntry>
    </typ:createPurchaseOrder>
  </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

request.description: Create PO using SOAP UI call

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:typ="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/purchaseOrderServiceV2/types/" xmlns:pur="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/purchaseOrderServiceV2/" xmlns:pjc="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/commonPo/flex/PJCPoDraftDistribution/" xmlns:draf="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchaseOrderDistribution/" xmlns:draf1="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchasingDocumentSchedule/" xmlns:draf2="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchasingDocumentLine/" xmlns:draf3="http://xmlns.oracle.com/apps/prc/po/editDocument/flex/draftPurchasingDocumentHeader/">
  <soapenv:Body>
    <typ:changePurchaseOrder>
      <typ:changeOrderEntry>
        <pur:OrderNumber>163868</pur:OrderNumber>
        <pur:DocumentStyleId>1</pur:DocumentStyleId>
        <pur:ApprovalActionCode>SUBMIT</pur:ApprovalActionCode>
        <pur:ProcurementBUId>300000046987012</pur:ProcurementBUId>
        <pur:RequisitioningBUId>300000046987012</pur:RequisitioningBUId>
        <pur:SoldToLegalEntityId>300000046973970</pur:SoldToLegalEntityId>
        <pur:BuyerId>300000047340498</pur:BuyerId>
        <pur:SupplierId>300000047507546</pur:SupplierId>
        <pur:SupplierSiteId>300000047507572</pur:SupplierSiteId>
        <pur:SupplierContactId>300000047507586</pur:SupplierContactId>
        <pur:BillToBUId>300000046987012</pur:BillToBUId>
        <pur:BillToLocationId>300000047013150</pur:BillToLocationId>
        <pur:CurrencyCode>USD</pur:CurrencyCode>
        <pur:DocumentDescription>Change Test Lance</pur:DocumentDescription>
        <pur:ChangeOrderDescription>Change Again Lance</pur:ChangeOrderDescription>
        <pur:PaymentTermsId>10134</pur:PaymentTermsId>
        <pur:CarrierId>300000047303443</pur:CarrierId>
        <pur:ModeOfTransportCode>PARCEL</pur:ModeOfTransportCode>
        <pur:ServiceLevelCode>UPSG</pur:ServiceLevelCode>
        <pur:FreightTermsCode>COLL</pur:FreightTermsCode>
        <pur:FOBCode>Origin</pur:FOBCode>
        <pur:PayOnReceiptFlag>false</pur:PayOnReceiptFlag>
        <pur:ConfirmingOrderFlag>true</pur:ConfirmingOrderFlag>
        <pur:InterfaceSourceCode>More4Apps</pur:InterfaceSourceCode>
        <pur:PurchaseOrderEntryLine>
          <pur:Action>CHANGE</pur:Action>
          <pur:LineNumber>1</pur:LineNumber>
          <pur:LineTypeId>1</pur:LineTypeId>
          <pur:ItemId>100000000458182</pur:ItemId>
          <pur:ItemDescription>1600x900 STD Resolution Monitor</pur:ItemDescription>
          <pur:CategoryId>300000047312457</pur:CategoryId>
          <pur:SupplierItem>Sup Item 12</pur:SupplierItem>
          <pur:UnitOfMeasureCode>zzu</pur:UnitOfMeasureCode>
          <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">19</pur:Quantity>
          <pur:Price currencyCode="USD">200</pur:Price>
          <pur:NegotiatedFlag>false</pur:NegotiatedFlag>
          <pur:NoteToSupplier>LINE NOTE</pur:NoteToSupplier>
          <pur:PurchaseOrderEntrySchedule>
            <pur:ScheduleNumber>1</pur:ScheduleNumber>
            <pur:Quantity unitCode="zzu">20</pur:Quantity>
            <pur:ShipToLocationId>300000047013200</pur:ShipToLocationId>
